title: Third Chances
description: Librarian Note: This is an alternate cover edition of ASIN: B01HQN8Q54. There are two alternate cover editions  here and  here.Rob lives a life of no-strings-attached encounters, traveling from one city to the next, with nothing to hold him in place. But there's something missing from his life, eating away at his happiness. When a girl from his past shows up during his brother's bachelor party, he's not going to let her slide through his fingers again. The only problem is that this girl is more than just a pretty face and a way to keep his bed warm at night. She's playing for keeps, and that's one game he's not sure he can win.
author: Ivy Smoak
